name: How to Apply to a Company ​
intro: Job hunting can often feel overwhelming, especially if you're just starting out or trying to make a significant career move. Over the years, I’ve learned a lot about what works—and what doesn’t—when applying for jobs, both as an applicant and a recruiter.
